content: You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Tonio., Tonio just said to you: '"Ah, thanks Marco! Appreciate that wage payment going through, eh?"' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're very welcome, Tonio! Glad to get it sorted for you."
You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Tonio., Tonio just said to you: '"Ah, thanks, Marco! Much appreciated."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're very welcome, Tonio! Glad to help."
